segments.text: Mary ! I haven ’ t seen you since our dinner with Mr . Lee last week . Where have you been hiding yourself lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi Mike . I ’ Ve been out of town the last few days . What did you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really , nothing big . I just heard about your ideas on employee motivation and I wanted chat with you about a few things going on in my department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , feel free to drop by my office any time . The door ’ s always open .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I was hoping to mix business with pleasure . Would you be interested in joining me for dinner some time this week ? I thought we might try out the new Italian restaurant everyone ’ s been
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , Mike , I ’ d love to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that ’ s perfect . We can leave directly from here .
segments.speaker: S2
